programme.desc: An American youngster goes to live in China with his mother, where he becomes an outsider and falls foul of the local bullies. He receives help from the kindly school caretaker, who turns out to be a kung fu master and offers to train the boy to defend himself. Martial arts drama, with Jaden Smith and Jackie Chan.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl struggles to cope with the torments of growing up, fitting in and finding a boyfriend. Tired of being a social outcast, she plans to throw the perfect birthday party to win the respect of her peers. Comedy drama based on Louise Rennison's series of novels, starring Georgia Groome, Alan Davies, Karen Taylor and Aaron Taylor-Johnson.(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.(n)

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke.(n)

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.(n)

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: A mermaid fleeing an arranged marriage becomes stranded at a beach resort. There she meets two local girls - lifelong friends about to be separated when one of them moves to Australia - and seeks their help in winning the heart of a lifeguard she has fallen for. In return, she promises to grant them their wish to stay together. Fantasy comedy, with Sara Paxton, Emma Roberts and Joanna Levesque.(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.

programme.title: Kidulthood
programme.desc: West London teenagers face difficult choices that could affect the rest of their lives, as they struggle to deal with the effects of gun crime, drugs and bullying in their impoverished neighbourhood. Drama, written by and starring Noel Clarke, with Aml Ameen, Red Madrell, Jaime Winstone and Rafe Spall.

programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: Following a failed assassination attempt, a soldier is stranded in the desert where he must survive the elements and stay sane enough to survive. Thriller, starring Armie Hammer, Annabelle Wallis and Tom Cullen.

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: xXx: The Return Of Xander Cage
programme.desc: The extreme sports-loving super spy is brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon known as Pandora's Box. Action thriller, starring Vin Diesel, Donnie Yen and Toni Collette.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A driverless train carrying a deadly cargo of toxic chemicals goes out of control. A veteran train operator and his rookie colleague set off in pursuit in their own locomotive, intending to bring it to a halt before it crashes and causes a major disaster. Action thriller, the final film from director Tony Scott, starring Denzel Washington, Chris Pine and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
programme.desc: Criminals hijack a crowded New York subway train and threaten to start shooting the passengers unless a $10million ransom is paid in one hour. However, the transport supervisor they issue their demands to begins to suspect the plot is part of an even grander scheme. Tony Scott's thriller remake, with Denzel Washington and John Travolta.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: A CIA agent stationed in South Africa is sent to question a rogue operative, who has been arrested years after betraying the agency, only to be attacked by mercenaries hired to capture the fugitive. As they flee for their lives, the interrogator has to contend with not only the enemies hunting them, but also the mind games of his prisoner. Thriller, with Denzel Washington and Ryan Reynolds.

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A police hostage negotiator is called in when a robbery turns into a siege. The chairman of the bank involved is worried the mastermind behind the heist is set to disclose secrets he needs to stay hidden, so he enlists the help of a political fixer. However, the elaborate nature of the thief's plan looks set to keep him one step ahead of the law, and causes problems for the detective assigned to rectify the situation. Spike Lee's thriller, with Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer, Willem Dafoe and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A driverless train carrying a deadly cargo of toxic chemicals goes out of control. A veteran train operator and his rookie colleague set off in pursuit in their own locomotive, intending to bring it to a halt before it crashes and causes a major disaster. Action thriller, the final film from director Tony Scott, starring Denzel Washington, Chris Pine and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
programme.desc: Criminals hijack a crowded New York subway train and threaten to start shooting the passengers unless a $10million ransom is paid in one hour. However, the transport supervisor they issue their demands to begins to suspect the plot is part of an even grander scheme. Tony Scott's thriller remake, with Denzel Washington and John Travolta.

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg.

programme.title: Rise Of The Footsoldier 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster Pat Tate rises through the ranks of Essex's criminal underworld. Prequel, starring Craig Fairbrass, Terry Stone and Roland Manookian.

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A police hostage negotiator is called in when a robbery turns into a siege. The chairman of the bank involved is worried the mastermind behind the heist is set to disclose secrets he needs to stay hidden, so he enlists the help of a political fixer. However, the elaborate nature of the thief's plan looks set to keep him one step ahead of the law, and causes problems for the detective assigned to rectify the situation. Spike Lee's thriller, with Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer, Willem Dafoe and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Conclusion of Francis Ford Coppola's crime drama trilogy, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach, Bridget Fonda and Joe Mantegna.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A respected academic goes on the run when he is framed for the murder of a French historian. Pursued by the detective on the case and a sinister assassin monk, he strives to unmask the culprit, leading to a conspiracy determined to preserve a 2,000-year-old secret at any cost. Thriller based on Dan Brown's novel, starring Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Paul Bettany and Jean Reno.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: A psychopathic rapist is released from prison after 14 years and plots revenge on the defence attorney he blames for his imprisonment. Subjecting the lawyer and his family to a terrifying campaign of intimidation, he uses his knowledge of the law to stay untouchable. Martin Scorsese's thriller remake, starring Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis, with cameo appearances by Gregory Peck, Robert Mitchum and Martin Balsam, who all appeared in the 1962 original.(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.(n)

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: A politician is attracted to a dancer he meets at a pivotal moment in his life, but finds his every effort to get to know her is thwarted by a group of mysterious men. He realises these shadowy figures are manipulating him and moving him toward a predetermined fate, which he resolves to fight. Sci-fi thriller, starring Matt Damon and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: Eliminators
programme.desc: A former federal agent in the witness protection programme is forced to come out of hiding and go on the run. Thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Stu Bennett and Daniel Caltagirone.(n)

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A mother looks to escape her abusive past by moving to a new town. There she befriends another mother, who grows suspicious of her. Thriller, starring Gina Gershon, Faye Dunaway and Nicolas Cage.(n)

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: A British diplomat in Kenya takes charge of the investigation into the murder of his wife, who had published an article highly critical of the money-making collusion between the High Commission and a pharmaceutical manufacturer. Fernando Meirelles' political thriller, based on John le Carre's novel, with Ralph Fiennes, Rachel Weisz, Danny Huston and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.(n)

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Former government operative Jason Bourne is drawn out of hiding to uncover more truths about his father, while CIA director Robert Dewey orders his head of cyber-security to hunt him down. Action thriller, starring Matt Damon, Tommy Lee Jones, Alicia Vikander and Julia Stiles.(n)

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: A police officer in a future Detroit ravaged by crime is seemingly killed in the line of duty, but is rebuilt as a law-enforcing cyborg by the corporation that has taken over running the force. He begins to remember his human life and seeks to bring his killers to justice - a mission that leads him to turn on his corrupt corporate masters. Sci-fi thriller, starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Ronny Cox and Miguel Ferrer.

programme.title: RoboCop 2
programme.desc: The cybernetic law enforcer returns to battle a deranged drug lord. Meanwhile, he is unaware the corporation that created him has scheduled his replacement by a more powerful version. To complete the new cyborg, they need a human brain, and a renegade scientist secretly implants the injured drug lord's brain into the robot, transforming it into an uncontrollable killing machine. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Tom Noonan and Belinda Bauer.

programme.title: Project: ALF
programme.desc: A lovable alien is captured by the US army who plan to destroy him, prompting two officers to come to his aid. Spin-off from the sci-fi comedy TV series, with Miguel Ferrer, Ed Begley Jr and Martin Sheen.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

programme.title: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A second astronaut arrives on the strange simian-dominated world searching for his predecessor. As he journeys into the infamous forbidden zone, he discovers an underground cult of psychic mutants. Meanwhile, a military coup has taken place among the ape society, leading to an inevitable battle. Sci-fi sequel, with James Franciscus, Charlton Heston and Kim Hunter.

programme.title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Intelligent chimpanzees Cornelius and Zira escape the destruction of their planet by travelling back in time to 1970s America. Although initially treated as celebrities, the government comes to regard the pair as a threat to the human race when it transpires that Zira is pregnant. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter, Sal Mineo and Ricardo Montalban.

programme.title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: In the near future, humanoid apes are used as slave labour by brutal humans. An intelligent chimpanzee, the son of two apes from a further distance in time, conceals his ability to speak and lives under the protection of a kindly circus master. But when he is exposed, he leads his fellow simians in a violent uprising. Sci-fi drama, presenting an origin story for the original movie, starring Roddy McDowall and Ricardo Montalban.

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn.

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The world's simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: The armoured avenger hunts for the mastermind behind an untraceable series of bombings, despite being cut off from his usual resources and traumatised by a recent brush with death. His search uncovers a secret conspiracy involving a drug that renders the user indestructible. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Gwyneth Paltrow and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger.

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The masked hero returns to face the Penguin, a grotesque crime boss dwelling in the sewers who conspires with a corrupt businessman to make himself mayor. When the tycoon tries to kill his secretary, she returns as vengeful vigilante Catwoman, who soon forms an intense relationship with the dark knight in both their costumed and real identities. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito and Michelle Pfeiffer.

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The masked crimefighter takes on the twin threats of disfigured maniac Two-Face and insane genius the Riddler, who are plotting to control the brains of the entire world. Meanwhile, an acrobat whose family has been murdered by Two-Face steps up to join Batman in his fight against evil. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Val Kilmer, Tommy Lee Jones, Nicole Kidman, Jim Carrey and Chris O'Donnell.

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures' fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors' safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger.

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: The armoured avenger hunts for the mastermind behind an untraceable series of bombings, despite being cut off from his usual resources and traumatised by a recent brush with death. His search uncovers a secret conspiracy involving a drug that renders the user indestructible. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Gwyneth Paltrow and Don Cheadle.

The creatures' fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors' safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell.

programme.title: Camera Obscura
programme.desc: A veteran war photographer with PTSD sees imminent deaths in his developed photos, questioning his already fragile sanity and putting the lives of those he loves in danger. Thriller, starring Christopher Denham, Nadja Bobyleva and Catherine Curtin.

programme.title: Strange Days
programme.desc: A paranoid ex-cop dealing in illegal virtual-reality experiences receives a compact disc that contains the memories of a murderer killing a prostitute. Suspecting an old flame might be in danger, he investigates further and uncovers a secret that could throw the entire city into chaos on New Year's Eve, 1999. Kathryn Bigelow's sci-fi thriller, starring Ralph Fiennes, Angela Bassett, Juliette Lewis and Tom Sizemore.(n)

programme.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: Julie James, the survivor of the original bloody events, sets off for a holiday in the Bahamas - but as soon as she arrives, her arch-enemy returns from the dead, forcing her into a desperate battle for survival. Horror sequel, starring Jennifer Love Hewitt, Freddie Prinze Jnr, Brandy Norwood and Mekhi Phifer.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on the Sky Cinema channels, plus other highlights showing on Sky.(n)

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara.(n)

programme.title: Double Date
programme.desc: A 29-year-old virgin and his extrovert mate get more than they bargained for when they meet beautiful sisters with a hidden agenda. Comedy thriller, starring Danny Morgan, Georgia Groome and Michael Socha.(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriend's father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: After the USS Enterprise is attacked during a rescue mission, Kirk, Spock and the crew struggle for survival on an alien planet while their mysterious assailant carries out his plans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Bad Match
programme.desc: An internet-dating playboy finds his life spiralling out of control when he meets a woman online. Thriller, starring Jack Cutmore-Scott, Lili Simmons and Noureen DeWulf.(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.(n)

Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: After the USS Enterprise is attacked during a rescue mission, Kirk, Spock and the crew struggle for survival on an alien planet while their mysterious assailant carries out his plans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Bad Match
programme.desc: An internet-dating playboy finds his life spiralling out of control when he meets a woman online. Thriller, starring Jack Cutmore-Scott, Lili Simmons and Noureen DeWulf.(n)

programme.title: An American Werewolf in London
programme.desc: A tourist is attacked while walking on the Yorkshire Moors and undergoes a terrifying metamorphosis, becoming a ravening werewolf whenever the moon is full. John Landis's horror comedy, starring David Naughton, Griffin Dunne and Jenny Agutter, with appearances by Brian Glover and Rik Mayall as unwelcoming locals in an isolated pub. Featuring special effects by Rick Baker.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: A leaky boat leaves the precocious youngsters stranded on a jungle island, but their luck changes when explorers the Wild Thornberrys come to their rescue. However, Thornberry dad Nigel loses his memory, so it falls to his daughter Eliza to save the day. Children's animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes
programme.desc: Stars and directors talk about making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections. Features Danny Boyle, Amy Schumer, Chiwetel Ejiofor and more.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes
programme.desc: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Hotel for Dogs
programme.desc: An orphaned brother and sister face losing their beloved dog when they go into a foster home that does not allow pets. The kids find the ideal hiding place in an abandoned hotel, and set about transforming it into luxury canine accommodation for not just their beloved pet, but every stray in town. Family comedy, starring Emma Roberts, Jake T Austin, Don Cheadle and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Carry On Teacher
programme.desc: A headmaster hopes to land a more prestigious job at a better school, but his pupils do not want him to leave. When two inspectors pay a visit, the mischievous students see a chance to sabotage his career plans with a series of pranks. Comedy, starring Ted Ray, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey and Kenneth Williams.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: The rugged Australian adventurer sets out to save his reporter girlfriend from New York drug dealers. Having rescued her from their clutches, he realises they will soon be coming after him - so he decides to even the odds by luring them to the Outback for a final showdown. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon and Charles S Dutton.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: A romantic novelist goes in search of her kidnapped sister in the steamy jungles of South America, only to become the target of a villainous general who demands as a ransom the valuable treasure map in her possession. Help is at hand in the form of a craggy daredevil fortune hunter, who has his eye on a share of the profits. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito.

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: John McClane goes to Russia having received word that his estranged son Jack is in trouble with the law. He is surprised to discover Jack is secretly a CIA agent, and father and son join forces to take on the Russian Mob, who are engaged in a plot to steal nuclear weapons. Action adventure sequel, starring Bruce Willis and Jai Courtney.

programme.title: Predator 2
programme.desc: A Los Angeles cop, working to bring down the city's drug gangs, suspects Jamaican criminals when he discovers several of his targets killed and skinned alive. However, the culprit behind the murders reveals himself to be an alien big-game hunter - with the stealth and guile to outwit the police and criminals alike. Sci-fi sequel, starring Danny Glover, Bill Paxton, Gary Busey and Maria Conchita Alonso.

programme.title: Sorcerer
programme.desc: Four men with shady pasts take a lucrative and potentially fatal delivery job driving two trucks full of dangerously unstable dynamite along equally unsound roads through the South American jungle. William Friedkin's thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Bruno Cremer, Francisco Rabal and Amidou.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A socially inept high-school student and his lonely unemployed brother find their eccentric home life thrown into upheaval when their meddling uncle comes to stay. The teenage oddball tries to make the best of his changing circumstances, while putting all his skills to the task of helping his new best friend win the class presidency. Comedy, starring Jon Heder, Efren Ramirez and Haylie Duff.

programme.title: Film4 Interview Programmes
programme.desc: Stars and directors talk about the experience of making movies in this compendium of personal and practical reflections.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: Ambitious fish Oscar dreams of escaping his humdrum undersea life. His wish comes true when a gangster shark keen to escape a world of organised crime seeks his help in faking his own death. But Oscar soon finds himself out of his depth as his fearsome reputation gets out of control. Animated comedy, with the voices of Will Smith, Robert De Niro, Martin Scorsese, Renee Zellweger, Angelina Jolie and Jack Black.

programme.title: Rio 2
programme.desc: Parrots Jewel and Blu lead a happy life together in Rio with their three chicks, until they find themselves hurled into an expedition up the Amazon. The journey leads to an encounter with an old enemy, while Blu also has to win the approval of Jewel's fearsome father. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway and Jamie Foxx.

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: A farmer hears a mysterious voice inspiring him to mark out a baseball diamond in a cornfield - which, to his surprise, is visited by the ghost of the star player of the 1919 Chicago White Sox team, whose career was cut short by scandal. It later dawns on him the pitch has a greater purpose - to give people who have sacrificed important parts of their lives a second chance. Fantasy, starring Kevin Costner, Ray Liotta, Burt Lancaster and James Earl Jones.

programme.title: The Jewel of the Nile
programme.desc: A novelist travels to the Middle East to become a sheik's official biographer, only to end up being held hostage by him. Her lover joins forces with an old enemy to rescue her, but they get drawn into the hunt for a mysterious ancient treasure that has a connection to an eccentric holy man. Comedy adventure sequel to Romancing the Stone, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito.

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang of corrupt cops that carries out bank robberies under the noses of their law-abiding colleagues is blackmailed into carrying out a seemingly impossible heist by the Russian Mob. They realise that the only way to carry out the crime is to kill a police officer as a diversion. Crime thriller, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, Casey Affleck, Kate Winslet and Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Welcome to the Punch
programme.desc: A criminal evades the law after a heist and goes into hiding overseas, leaving the detective on his trail tormented by his failure. He gets a second chance when the crook returns to visit his hospitalised son, but the investigation brings to light a conspiracy that threatens both men. Crime thriller, starring James McAvoy, Mark Strong, Andrea Riseborough and David Morrissey.

programme.title: Les Combattants
programme.desc: A directionless man facing an uncertain future meets a woman who believes that civilisation is doomed to fall apart very soon. He follows her to an army boot camp, where she is hoping to learn survival skills, and romance blossoms as they struggle with the hardships of their training. Romantic drama, starring Adele Haenel and Kevin Azais. In French.(n)

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.sub-title: BSL Zone: Close Up: Ilyaas Cader
programme.desc: An interview with Ilyass Cader, a deaf refugee from Sri Lanka's civil war, who has made his home in Britain.(n)

programme.title: Siege of the Saxons
programme.desc: King Arthur is betrayed and killed by one of his knights, who has formed an alliance with an invading Saxon horde and intends to seize the throne himself. However, the dead monarch's daughter is rescued by an outlaw, who seeks the aid of Merlin in ensuring the crown passes to her instead of the villainous usurper. Medieval adventure, starring Ronald Lewis, Janette Scott and John Laurie.(n)

programme.title: 7th Cavalry
programme.desc: An army officer is branded a coward for failing to fight in the Battle of the Little Bighorn, and is unable to convince anyone that official business had detained him. In a bid to repair his damaged reputation, he leads a cavalry detail to retrieve the dead from the battlefield. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Jay C Flippen and Jeanette Nolan.(n)

programme.title: Beau Geste
programme.desc: Three brothers are accused of stealing from their aristocratic adopted mother. They seek to salvage their honour by joining the Foreign Legion, battling a rampaging Arab army as well as coming into conflict with their sadistic commanding officer. Action adventure, starring Gary Cooper, Ray Milland, Robert Preston and Brian Donlevy.(n)

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: The ruler of the Persian empire vows to expand his realm by conquering Greece. The king of Sparta steps forward to defend his homeland and the other kingdoms of Greece, but when he is betrayed by a political council, he finds himself without an army and must fend off the vast invading army with a mere 300 warriors. Historical drama, starring Richard Egan, Ralph Richardson and Diane Baker.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A scientist and four members of his crew develop superhuman powers after exposure to cosmic radiation on a mission to study an energy storm in space. Unfortunately, one of them chooses to use his new-found abilities for evil purposes, compelling the others to join forces to stop him. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis and Julian McMahon.(n)

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: A courier is kidnapped and forced to become a drug mule. When she is exposed to the experimental chemicals she is smuggling, it boosts her intelligence and reflexes to superhuman levels. She uses her newfound abilities to get revenge on her captors, but as the process continues, she evolves into something more than human. Sci-fi thriller, starring Scarlett Johansson and Morgan Freeman.(n)

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
programme.desc: A US embassy in Libya comes under attack from extremists, who kill the ambassador. With no help in sight, a small band of CIA security operatives from various military backgrounds takes a stand to fight off the attackers and protect the remaining diplomatic personnel. Fact-based action thriller, starring John Krasinski and James Badge Dale.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob ends up in hospital with appendicitis, forcing Grandpa and John-Boy to rely on a famous author to help them complete an important contract.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Cousins Ham, Cora and Job come to stay on Walton's Mountain, but they prove to be out-and-out crooks.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Amorous Walnut Grove newcomer Adam Simms falls in love with Miss Beadle, while his son Luke proves he's a chip off the old block by persuading Nellie Oleson to run away with him.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A Native American boy arrives in Walnut Grove seeking medical help for his desperately ill father, but faces racial hatred from the townsfolk. Drama, starring Michael Landon.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: When she and Owen got their marriage licence, Syd begins to feel guilty about kissing Dr Baylor.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd misses her wedding shower, while Owen is invited to spend Thanksgiving with the Hansens.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin and Mary Ellen enter a traditionally all-male race to raise money for the war effort, with Elizabeth coaching them. Jeffrey dreams of meeting a movie star.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jeffrey befriends a German prisoner of war who has escaped from a camp in North Carolina and hidden in the mountains, and the family asks him to join them for Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Cindy is introduced to a self-help book on how to be the perfect wife, but when she follows the instructions found within she risks going into premature labour due to exhaustion.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A soldier in Jason's company explains what is happening to the Jews at the hands of the Nazis in Europe. Meanwhile, Elizabeth gets teased for being such a smart student at school.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Kathy McCormick
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a woman from the wrong side of the tracks who falls for an elegant playboy and finds herself forced to lead a double life. Barbara Eden, Josh Taylor and Judy Geeson star.

programme.title: Daniel's Daughter
programme.desc: A magazine editor receives news of her estranged father's death, and agrees to fulfil his final wish to scatter his ashes at the family's old home, an undertaking forces her to confront the past she left behind. Drama, starring Laura Leighton, London Angelis, Martin Doyle, Brandon Firla and Dorly Jean-Louis.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Daddy
programme.desc: An advertising executive's wife walks out, leaving him to raise their children alone - a problem compounded by his mother's death in a car accident. Drama, starring Patrick Duffy, Lynda Carter, Kate Mulgrew and featuring an early appearance by Ben Affleck.

programme.title: At the Midnight Hour
programme.desc: A recently widowed scientist hires a nanny to care for his children, and surprises himself by falling head over heels in love with her. Romantic drama, based on Alicia Scott's best-selling novel, starring Simon MacCorkindale and Patsy Kensit.

programme.title: Promises to Keep
programme.desc: An old man learns he has a terminal illness, and decides he needs to rebuild his relationship with the family he abandoned 30 years ago. However, his son finds it difficult to forgive him for leaving them. Drama, starring Robert Mitchum with his real-life son Christopher and great-nephew Bentley. With Tess Harper and Claire Bloom.

programme.title: That'll Be the Day
programme.desc: A school dropout leaves home and drifts through a succession of dead-end jobs until he finds an outlet for his frustration in rock 'n' roll. Drama, starring David Essex, Ringo Starr, Keith Moon, Billy Fury, Robert Lindsay and Rosemary Leach.

programme.title: Have You Seen My Son
programme.desc: A woman strives to find her sick son after he is kidnapped by her ex-husband. Drama, starring Lisa Hartman Black, William Russ, Jameson Parker, Anne Francis and Scott Hylands.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy receives a visit from cousin Homer, but the Baldwin sisters are unaware of his criminal record until he makes off with much of the stock for their reunion banquet recipe.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After meeting an itinerant singer, a restless Mary Ellen decides to run away from home. However, when he does not take kindly to her following him, she disappears again and is left up to John-Boy to find her. Meanwhile, the rest of the family works hard picking apples to save enough money to send her on a trip to Washington to cure her wanderlust.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura realises she is in love with Jimmy while they are out collecting frogs. Meanwhile, Caroline becomes unhappy as Charles' new job takes him away with increasing frequency.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary takes a teaching job in an isolated town, but soon finds her methods are too radical for the conservative residents. Melissa Sue Anderson stars.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie loses Leo's trust when she lets out a secret on radio.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A tornado strikes, interrupting Syd and Owen's final wedding preparations and events soon take a dramatic turn.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth falls for a new teacher, but is devastated to find he does not have long to live. Meanwhile, Ben worries about his new responsibilities as Cindy gives birth to a girl.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Josh gets caught breaking into Ike's store with Jeffrey, who manages to get away without being seen. Meanwhile, Ben decides to enlist after being humiliated by a soldier.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Zadok Walton, Grandpa's cousin, arrives unannounced to keep a date he made with Zeb 21 years earlier.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mamie Baldwin develops a cataract, but refuses to undergo an operation, forcing John to take desperate measures.

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird.

programme.title: A Change of Place
programme.desc: A shy girl whose identical twin is a supermodel is persuaded to take her glamorous sister's place on the Paris catwalks, little suspecting a life-changing romance is waiting just around the corner. Drama, with Andrea Roth, Rick Springfield and Stephanie Beacham.

programme.title: Montana Sky
programme.desc: Three women with the same father but different mothers meet for the first time after their estranged father dies. They discover he has left them his ranch in his will - on the condition that they run the estate together for at least a year. Unfortunately, they soon learn the old man had enemies determined to make sure they fail. Drama, starring Ashley Williams, Charlotte Ross and Laura Mennell.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Three young sisters and their brother are orphaned in early childhood, and while three of them are found loving and protective homes, one suffers a life of neglect and poverty. Thirty years later they are reunited, but the elder sister has a shocking secret she needs to share. Drama based on a novel by Danielle Steel, starring Jaclyn Smith, Perry King, Colleen Dewhurst and Claudia Christian.

programme.title: She Drives Me Crazy
programme.desc: A woman whose husband has recently died is invited on a road trip by her wilder estranged sister. The widow soon learns her younger sibling has a very important reason for taking this journey, which changes both their lives for ever. Drama, starring Krista Bridges and Melinda Clarke.

programme.title: Bringing Ashley Home
programme.desc: When Libba Phillips' troubled younger sister Ashley suddenly goes missing, she sets out to locate her sibling and bring her home. As the years go by, Libba's resolve remains true, at the expense of her marriage and her career. However, personal loss does not deter her from the mission, and she finds a new calling in life creating a resource centre for the families of other people who have falled through the cracks. Fact-based drama, starring AJ Cook.

programme.title: A Sister's Secret
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town, hoping to save a paper mill owned by her father's company. However, she attracts the attention of her high-school boyfriend's sister, who blames her for his untimely death and seeks the opportunity to take revenge. Thriller, starring Alexandra Paul, Cynthia Preston and Paul Whitney.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A famous film star is stranded on the mountain when her car breaks down and is invited to stay with the Waltons, putting on a one-woman show to raise her train fare back to the city. While she charms most of the family, Olivia is not convinced by her tall tales. Pippa Scott and Dorothy Neuman guest star.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A girl befriended by the family is shocked to learn her drunken father was responsible for burning down the school to prevent Miss Hunter teaching the theory of evolution.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caroline prepares to celebrate her wedding anniversary, but a broken wheel on Charles's wagon looks set to thwart the evening. Drama, starring Michael Landon.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Please Be My Friend - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Laura traces the author of a letter in a bottle, only to end up holding the baby. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Melissa Gilbert.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Just as Syd and Owen are about to embark on a new life of marital bliss, a hostage situation breaks out at the ER.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A hostage situation at the ER breaks out spoiling Syd and Owen's marital bliss.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan helps a paralysed man who has fallen in love, but fears his condition will ruin the relationship. Mark is reluctant to get involved, as the woman in question is his cousin.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A greedy tycoon meets a kindly homeless man who is his exact double, and they decide to switch places to see how the other half lives. Guest starring Ned Beatty in a dual role.(n)

programme.title: A Soldier's Love Story
programme.desc: A sergeant in the US Army serving in Afghanistan becomes a father figure to a lonely boy who writes to him from California. When the soldier returns from his tour of duty, he visits the youngster and begins to develop a relationship with the lad's divorced mother. Romantic drama, with Lori Loughlin and Johnny Messner.(n)

programme.title: A Lover's Revenge
programme.desc: A radio psychologist gives some advice to a distraught woman desperate to escape from an abusive partner. When the female listener plucks up the courage to end the relationship, her deranged ex-lover blames the presenter, and he decides to pay her a visit. Thriller, starring Alexandra Paul, William Moses and Gary Hudson.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy learns the sheriff is a war hero, but wants to forget the terrible things he witnessed during the conflict.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Richest Man in Walnut Grove
programme.desc: Charles and his boss anticipate a large income from a big job. However things fail to go according to plan, which puts a financial strain on the family as they pull together to make ends meet.(n)

programme.title: McBride: It's Murder, Madam
programme.desc: An aspiring actress thinks she has landed on her feet when she is offered a job straight after arriving in town - but her good fortune proves short-lived when she is accused of murdering her new boss. Luckily, maverick lawyer McBride is happy to help clear her name. Crime drama, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois, Matt Lutz and Claire Coffee.(n)

programme.title: McBride: Murder Past Midnight
programme.desc: The crusading lawyer is called up for jury duty in the case of a woman thought to have poisoned her wealthy husband. However, he ends up reluctantly agreeing to defend the accused when she is retried. Mystery, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois and Matt Lutz.(n)

programme.title: Jacqueline Bouvier Kennedy
programme.desc: The first of a two-part mini-series exploring the life of the First Lady, from her years as a photojournalist to her husband's election as President. Starring Jaclyn Smith and James Franciscus.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: An ambitious bartender and his mentor become the talk of New York before their differences drive them apart. Relocating in Jamaica, the barman is torn between the waitress he loves and a wealthy older woman who can make his dreams of running his own establishment come true. Drama, starring Tom Cruise, Bryan Brown, Elisabeth Shue and Lisa Banes.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: An ambitious bartender and his mentor become the talk of New York before their differences drive them apart. Relocating in Jamaica, the barman is torn between the waitress he loves and a wealthy older woman who can make his dreams of running his own establishment come true. Drama, starring Tom Cruise, Bryan Brown, Elisabeth Shue and Lisa Banes.(n)

programme.title: The Boy She Met Online
programme.desc: A teenage girl falls madly in love with someone claiming to be a college student, whom she meets on a social networking website, and keeps her internet romance a secret from her mother. However, she is unaware that everything he has told her about himself is a lie. Drama, starring Tracy Spiridakos, Jon Cor and Alexandra Paul.(n)

programme.title: Christie's Revenge
programme.desc: Danielle Kind stars in this thriller as Christie, a teenage girl whose father committed suicide several years earlier. When she discovers that her wealthy uncle refused to give her dad the financial help he was desperate for, driving him to take his own life, Christie vows to get revenge. Cynthia Gibb and John Wesley Shipp co-star.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan helps a paralysed man who has fallen in love, but fears his condition will ruin the relationship. Mark is reluctant to get involved, as the woman in question is his cousin.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A greedy tycoon meets a kindly homeless man who is his exact double, and they decide to switch places to see how the other half lives. Guest starring Ned Beatty in a dual role.(n)

programme.title: A Soldier's Love Story
programme.desc: A sergeant in the US Army serving in Afghanistan becomes a father figure to a lonely boy who writes to him from California. When the soldier returns from his tour of duty, he visits the youngster and begins to develop a relationship with the lad's divorced mother. Romantic drama, with Lori Loughlin and Johnny Messner.(n)

programme.title: A Lover's Revenge
programme.desc: A radio psychologist gives some advice to a distraught woman desperate to escape from an abusive partner. When the female listener plucks up the courage to end the relationship, her deranged ex-lover blames the presenter, and he decides to pay her a visit. Thriller, starring Alexandra Paul, William Moses and Gary Hudson.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy learns the sheriff is a war hero, but wants to forget the terrible things he witnessed during the conflict.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Richest Man in Walnut Grove
programme.desc: Charles and his boss anticipate a large income from a big job. However things fail to go according to plan, which puts a financial strain on the family as they pull together to make ends meet.(n)

programme.title: McBride: It's Murder, Madam
programme.desc: An aspiring actress thinks she has landed on her feet when she is offered a job straight after arriving in town - but her good fortune proves short-lived when she is accused of murdering her new boss. Luckily, maverick lawyer McBride is happy to help clear her name. Crime drama, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois, Matt Lutz and Claire Coffee.(n)

programme.title: McBride: Murder Past Midnight
programme.desc: The crusading lawyer is called up for jury duty in the case of a woman thought to have poisoned her wealthy husband. However, he ends up reluctantly agreeing to defend the accused when she is retried. Mystery, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois and Matt Lutz.(n)

programme.title: Jacqueline Bouvier Kennedy
programme.desc: The first of a two-part mini-series exploring the life of the First Lady, from her years as a photojournalist to her husband's election as President. Starring Jaclyn Smith and James Franciscus.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: An ambitious bartender and his mentor become the talk of New York before their differences drive them apart. Relocating in Jamaica, the barman is torn between the waitress he loves and a wealthy older woman who can make his dreams of running his own establishment come true. Drama, starring Tom Cruise, Bryan Brown, Elisabeth Shue and Lisa Banes.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: An ambitious bartender and his mentor become the talk of New York before their differences drive them apart. Relocating in Jamaica, the barman is torn between the waitress he loves and a wealthy older woman who can make his dreams of running his own establishment come true. Drama, starring Tom Cruise, Bryan Brown, Elisabeth Shue and Lisa Banes.(n)

programme.title: The Family
programme.desc: Romesh’s wife Leesa and their three kids arrive in Los Angeles. Leesa wants to help Romesh live a healthier lifestyle and goes to some extreme measures to achieve this, while Uncle Rags causes another major problem for Rom.(c)

programme.title: The TV Debut
programme.desc: Romesh reaches out to some comedy managers to help him get his first American television appearance. He also has to prove to Leesa that he has found a solution for the education of their kids in Los Angeles.(c)

programme.title: Walking Out
programme.desc: Once a year, fourteen-year-old David (Josh Wiggins) travels from his mother's home in Texas to visit his loner father, Cal (Matt Bomer), in the remote mountains of Montana. There, the two embark on their annual hunting excursion, during which the taciturn Cal attempts to connect with his smartphone-addicted son. But when a terrifying turn of events leaves Cal critically wounded, it's up to the teenage David to summon enough strength for both of them.

programme.title: At Last
programme.desc: Patrick confronts the past on the day of his mother's memorial service. Now truly clean and sober, he attempts to solve the puzzle of his mother’s complicity in his father’s abuse, as well as answer his father’s question, ‘What will you do with your life?’ Limited Series Finale.(c)

programme.title: American Carnage
programme.desc: As violence erupts in Charlottesville, the president’s unwillingness to denounce the racist hate groups presents a new test for journalists. Trump blames the “failing New York Times” and “crooked media” for distorting his speech and further deepening the country’s divisions. Meanwhile, Steve Bannon exits the White House and a Times reporter questions where his populist revolution is headed now, as the paper deals with reining in its own reporters on Twitter.(c)

programme.title: Elmsley Count
programme.desc: Axe dominates a capital raise event, but is soon challenged by an unexpected competitor. Chuck looks to strike the ultimate blow on an enemy. Wendy reckons with past decisions, and chooses a side. Connerty confronts Sacker about Chuck's activities. Taylor takes a big position. Season finale.(c)

programme.title: Between Us
programme.desc: Adam and Ralph get some good news. Goldie calls Amanda’s bluff. Ron tries to salvage good will from employers and coworkers. Adam assesses his relationship with Gloria. Bill helps Nick face legal trouble, while Nick confronts his Uncle Chris. Eddie receives a tough lesson in love from Roy. Cassie bonds with Dawn.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence

programme.title: The TV Debut
programme.desc: Romesh reaches out to some comedy managers to help him get his first American television appearance. He also has to prove to Leesa that he has found a solution for the education of their kids in Los Angeles.(c)

programme.title: Double Take
programme.desc: Framed in a multimillion-dollar laundering scheme, upstanding investment banker Daryl (Orlando Jones) suddenly finds himself running from the FBI and swapping identities with petty thief Freddy (Eddie Griffin). As he dashes for the Mexican border in search of the one man who can clear his name, Daryl discovers his new alias is even more wanted than he is.

programme.title: Operation Odessa
programme.desc: This is a true crime documentary featuring a Russian mobster, a Miami playboy and a Cuban spy who sold a Soviet submarine to a Colombian drug cartel for $35 million. A mid-'90s gangster epic that hopscotches from Brooklyn to Miami and Cali to Moscow, the film tells the story of three friends who set out to hustle the Russian mob, the Cali cartel and the DEA for the score of a lifetime.

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: High school geek Arnie Cunningham falls in love with Christine, a bright red 1957 Plymouth Fury which has seen much better days. After restoring the car to its original condition, his friends notice that the car is not the only thing that is changing. Arnie seems to spend more and more time with his car. He's also developed a cocky arrogance which does not seem like the real Arnie at all.

programme.title: Swing Away
programme.desc: Following a meltdown that leads to a suspension, professional golfer Zoe Papadopoulos travels to her grandparents' village in Greece to escape the harsh spotlight of the international sports world. Between baking bread and eating baklava, she meets and mentors a ten-year-old girl who is determined to become the next golf sensation. Along the way, Zoe rediscovers her Greek heritage, her love of the game and the hidden strength within herself.

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombing, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the bombers before they strike again. The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.
